|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR5112A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, N-Female |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Side B" and "AP : 20-100850-000 REV1" is silkscreened on the main component side of the board in the FCC photos. "Side A", "CAS01.00A", "S/N: 81-100850-00[ ]" is silkscreened on the back of the board. :Similar if not identical to the [[Airespace 1250 (AS-1250-ABG-EXT)]], again '''Wistron NeWeb''' is the presumed manufacturer
The RAM chip appears to be a MT48LC4M32B2. The Flash is likely 4MB like the Airespace 1250.
Per the FCC test report, this device is the... *AIR-LAP1510AG-A-K9 **in the US *AIR-LAP1510AG-N-K9 **in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Mexico, and Taiwan
[[Category:English Documentation]]
